projects.title: Dunder-Mifflen Paper Company (MERN E-Commerce)
projects.description: Full-stack MERN e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, shopping cart with persistent storage, Stripe payment integration, admin dashboard for product and order management, and 25+ products across multiple categories.
features: Secure JWT authentication with password hashing
Shopping cart with database persistence across sessions
Admin dashboard with sales analytics and inventory management
Real-time low stock alerts for admins
Complete CRUD operations for products and orders
projects.challenges: Deploying a full-stack application to a Raspberry Pi with proper SSL configuration, managing environment variables across development and production, implementing secure authentication with JWT tokens, and integrating Stripe payment processing.
projects.learnings: Gained comprehensive experience with the MERN stack, implementing REST APIs, secure authentication patterns, payment gateway integration, database design with MongoDB, Linux server administration, Nginx configuration, and production deployment workflows.

projects.title: Jeopardy! Game
projects.description: Interactive Jeopardy game that fetches real questions from an API, with dynamic categories and question/answer reveal mechanics
features: Fetches random categories from Jeopardy API
Click to reveal question, click again to reveal answer
Restart game to get new categories
Responsive design for different screen sizes
Visual feedback on hover and click
projects.challenges: Managing asynchronous API calls and ensuring smooth data flow between multiple categories. Handling different states (loading, question, answer) for each clue cell.
projects.learnings: Gained experience with async/await, working with external APIs, DOM manipulation with jQuery, and state management in vanilla JavaScript. Learned to handle API responses and dynamically populate HTML elements.
